Articles.Content:
I have amassed a small album of screenshots from my adventures. This thread is to showcase some of them and the stories behind them.

Name: What's My Altitude?

Story: I let Jeb near the altimeter. Not making that mistake again...

Name: Sunflake

Story: during a (botched) Munar mission, I cast off the boosters, onion-style. I had 6 boosters, and I pivoted until I was looking at Kerbol. Then I staged and captured this image.

Name: COMMENCE FIRE!!!!

Story: I was trying to develop a mobile artillery unit using Tosh's Cart plugin and Jellycube's railgun. Wound up mixing in Damned Robotics, but results were respectable. Just make sure you set your brakes before firing!

That's it for now. Enjoy!

Time for another round of pics...

Name: Matvey's Kross

Story: The Korolev Cross is the name given to the ejected boosters of the R-7 family of launchers, due to the cruciform shape they take as they tumble. Matvey encountered a similar event on this mission... Looks kinda cool.

Name: Huh?!?!?

Story: the fuel tank south of the launch pad has a functional ladder on the side, so I decided to climb it. after many failed attempts, I finally made it on top to find this shot... a levitating Kerbal. Couldn't resist taking the screenshot.

Name: Merwin's Sunset

Story: After beginning experiments with Mechjeb and VTOL flight, I decided to land on the VAB. I happened to land just after sunset, and decided to get this scenic vista from atop the VAB.
